name: JUDE FELIX HOCKEY ACADEMY CHARITABLE TRUST

address: No 2,2Nd Cross,C/O St Mary'S Orphanage, Da'Costa Layout

briefDescription: VISION:  Nurturing Life through Hockey and other Sports.MISSION: To develop hockey at the grassroots, nurture vulnerable children and empower them through a centre of excellence.VALUES:Integrity, dignity, fair play and zero tolerance for discrimination.OBJECTIVES: -	Promote Hockey in the Community -	Impart hockey skills -	Nurture talented players-	Create a centre of excellence for grassroots hockey We have trained close to 2000 children till date.
